data.title: Gardner Dozois - Modern CLassics of Science Fiction
data.meta_description: Gardner Dozois - Modern CLassics of Science Fiction - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. Gardner dozois: this anthology is not an evolutionary overview of science fiction. It is not really a historical survey of the various periods of science fiction history. He says the stories are not selected because they are good examples of a trend or a type of writing.
